pokemons.name: Bulbasaur
pokemons.description: Bulbasaur is a Grass/Poison type Pokémon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Seed Pokémon.

pokemons.name: Charmander
pokemons.description: Charmander is a Fire type Pokémon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Lizard Pokémon.

pokemons.name: Squirtle
pokemons.description: Squirtle is a Water type Pokémon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Tiny Turtle Pokémon.

pokemons.name: Caterpie
pokemons.description: Caterpie is a Bug type Pokémon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Worm Pokémon.

pokemons.name: Pidgey
pokemons.description: Pidgey is a Normal/Flying type Pokémon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Tiny Bird Pokémon.

pokemons.name: Rattata
pokemons.description: Rattata is a Normal type Pokémon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Mouse Pokémon.

pokemons.name: Ekans
pokemons.description: Ekans is a Poison type Pokémon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Snake Pokémon.

pokemons.name: Pikachu
pokemons.description: Pikachu is an Electric type Pokémon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Mouse Pokémon.

pokemons.name: Sandshrew
pokemons.description: Sandshrew is a Ground type Pokémon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Mouse Pokémon.

pokemons.name: Jigglypuff
pokemons.description: Jigglypuff is a Normal/Fairy type Pokémon introduced in Generation 1. It is known as the Balloon Pokémon.
